title: ‘The Critics Motivated Her’: Tour de France Femmes Finisher Kuskova Can Go WorldTour, Says Tashkent DS
content:
Starchyk believes controversial UCI points rule which got Tashkent City into race should remain as team’s lone finisher Kuskova reflects on 'painful' criticisms.

Read the full article at ‘The Critics Motivated Her’: Tour de France Femmes Finisher Kuskova Can Go WorldTour, Says Tashkent DS on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
